author: Maryam Zarif
text: Same here. 🤫🤣 https://t.co/YzIhllD3zH

author: Maryam Zarif
text: There will be some things you won't get over. Some things that will sting you so hard they will set you back to where you started and you will hurt, hurt and hurt.

author: Maryam Zarif
text: I can feel you. I lost my Nana Abu and Dada Abu last month. Now, the house is completely empty and nothing is as it used to be.💔 https://t.co/RgNgRyS0Xy

author: Maryam Zarif
text: The ones I love, the ones I want to be with for the rest of my life, I've never thought about going away, so what will that day be like? I wish we had our destiny in our hands.💔

author: Maryam Zarif
text: My eyes are already filled with thoughts of those who are dearer to me, so what will happen in that moment?

author: Maryam Zarif
text: A while ago, I was lying on my bed thinking that my degree would end in a year. What will my last day at university be like? Everyone has to say goodbye. Now those without whom not a moment passes, my people will be far away from me.

author: Maryam Zarif
text: Me too! https://t.co/9k3m1qj4pM

author: Maryam Zarif
text:
Slowly preparing myself for "Achnak aur zabardasti ki Chand raat".😮‍💨
Let's see what's up!🤷🏻‍♀️

author: Maryam Zarif
text: It's worth it but it tastes like Zehar.🥵 https://t.co/PeINitu4Mn

author: Maryam Zarif
text: Same here 💔 https://t.co/ZZF5738Xec

author: Maryam Zarif
text:
I pray that yours will be accepted and prayers answered and grant us all the best of both worlds. Ameen.🤲🏻
Laylat Al-Qadr Mubarak.✨🤍

author: Maryam Zarif
text: Pray for your family, Close ones, friends and your future spouse. Ask Allah for your every little desire. He's listening you up there and Ask for what you have to ask for tonight.

author: Maryam Zarif
text: Here comes the Night of Power. On this special night, May Allah purify our intentions and make us acceptable in our time.This is a night that is better than a thousand nights.

author: Maryam Zarif
text: What a miserable time for this sickness to befall.💔

author: Maryam Zarif
text: In the Second last week** 🤫😂😂 https://t.co/GF1TC99Voi

author: Maryam Zarif
text: Beautiful ❤️ https://t.co/A9z40yGnqE

author: Maryam Zarif
text: The sleep that comes after Sehri.💤 https://t.co/EILsYMY7Uh

author: Maryam Zarif
text:
Everything seems meaningless when you don't have peace of mind. When you feel that one can't understand your situation from words, so it is better to remain silent. 
We rejoice in the happiness of the people but forget that we have no importance in their lives.

author: Maryam Zarif
text: Let your akhlaq be the reason people remember you long after you are gone, let your generosity and kindness be the reason people say prayers for you because I swear that is all you’ll need.🎀

author: Maryam Zarif
text: Wholesome moments.🥺❤️ https://t.co/9zrzN08OSl

author: Maryam Zarif
text: Sit alone in silence, it’s always a blessing to soak in your own energy without interruption.

author: Maryam Zarif
text:
The turbans they place on the head of our elders, in it they need to trample their own emotions first.
These family customs is such a debt, that is not due, but you have to pay it.💔

author: Maryam Zarif
text:
I've come to realize that there's a world of difference between knowing something happened, even knowing why it happened and believing it.

~Gayle Forman, Where She Went.

author: Maryam Zarif
text: No one else can decide what your tough looks like.

author: Maryam Zarif
text: And I missed them today!😔🥺 https://t.co/kcpzBvIjhp

author: Maryam Zarif
text: Everybody carries something that keeps them up at night.
